name: Planetary Defense (Tenacious Teal)
description:
The Universe has succumb to chaotic forces. Asteroids barrel through pace at tremendous speeds. Earth deploys its only weapon: 3 energy rings. They just need a competent commander to guide them and protect against certain annihilation.

An homage to  old arcade games like, Missile Command, Planetary Defense employs easy to master mechanics and the simplicity of games from a bygone era.

Test your skills against that of other players and climb the leadership board.

Point out any bugs or UI difficulties and we will patch them.

Ideal browser for this game: Google Chrome

Credits

Jorge Rodriguez: Gamification

William Funk: Main game design and programming

A Tenacious Teal Production
